name: seo-meta-validator
author: Raffael Jesche
description: Validate structured data like jsonld of html documents - work in progress

scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:sass
scripts.watch:js: npm run build:js && onchange "src/js/*.js" "src/js/presets/*.js" -- npm run build:js
scripts.watch:js:dev: npm run build:js:dev && onchange "src/js/*.js" "src/js/presets/*.js" -- npm run build:js:dev
scripts.watch:sass: npm run build:sass && npm run build:sass -- -w
